DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: MEDEIROS, D;MEDEIROS, DCIO;MEDEIROS, D.;PEIXOTO, DCIO M.;PEIXOTO, DCIO M;PEIXOTO, DCIO MEDEIROS;MEDEIROS, DECIO;MEDEIROS PEIXOTO, DCIO;PEIXOTO, DECIO MEDEIROS;MEDEIROS1, 4,5, DCIO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui mestrado em Sade da Criana e do Adolescente pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2004), doutorado e ps doutorado em Pediatria e Cincias Aplicadas Pediatria pela Universidade Federal de So Paulo (2009, 2021). Atualmente professor associado da rea Acadmica de Pediatria do Centro de Cincias Mdicas da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, atuando nas disciplinas de Pediatria e de Alergia e Imunologia Clinica. Atua tambm nas ps graduaes da Sade da Criana e do Adolescente e de Sade Translacional. Tem experincia na rea de Medicina, com nfase em Alergologia e Imunologia Clnica, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: asma, atopia, broncoespasmo e sibilncia em lactentes.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: master's at Paediatrics from Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2004) and ph.d. at Paediatrics from Universidade Federal de So Paulo (2009). Has experience in Medicine, focusing on Allergology and Clinical Imunology, acting on the following subjects: asma, atopia, broncoespasmo, ige and parasitose.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Traduo, adaptao para o portugus (cultura brasileira) e validao do ?Test for Respiratory and Asthma Control in Kids (TRACK)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
Projeto com objetivo de traduzir e adaptar para o portugus (cultura brasileira) o questionrio TRACK;
Validar a verso em portugus do questionrio TRACK;
Definir o ponto de corte capaz de discriminar crianas com asma controlada de crianas com asma no controlada e
Identificar a menor pontuao do questionrio capaz de indicar mudana clinicamente relevante (MID).

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Oscilometria de impulso na avaliao da funo pulmonar em crianas com broncoespasmo induzido pelo exerccio utilizando a hiperventilao eucpnica voluntria
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O trabalho objetiva descrever as alteraes nos parmetros de funo pulmonar, em crianas em idade escolar portadoras de asma que apresentem broncoespasmo induzido pela Hiperventilao eucpnica voluntria e verificar a existncia de correlao entre as variveis obtidas atravs da oscilometria deimpulso e da espirometria antes da realizao da hiperventilao eucpnica voluntria, listar as alteraes na funo pulmonar nos parmetros da espirometria (VEF1, CVF, VEF1/CVF e FEF 25/75) e da oscilometria (R5, R20, R5-R20, X5 e AX) aps a realizao da hiperventilao eucpnica voluntria ecompreender a magnitude do broncoespasmo induzido pelo exerccio utilizando a hiperventilao

Assessing caries, dental plaque and salivary flow in asthmatic adolescents using inhaled corticosteroids

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: BACKGROUND: A number of studies have reported that inhaled corticosteroids may cause a greater incidence of caries, reduced salivary flow, changes in saliva composition and an increased frequency of dental plaque, probably through alterations in the oral microbiota. The objective was to compare the frequency of caries, dental plaque and non-stimulated salivary flow rate among asthmatic adolescents using inhaled corticosteroids and non-asthmatic adolescents, as well as the salivary biochemical parameters (pH and leucocytes) in both groups. METHODS: This research has a descriptive cross-sectional design to compare dental health of 40 asthmatics on inhaled corticosteroids and 40 non-asthmatic adolescents (median age 13 years). RESULTS: The findings were a higher number of tooth surfaces affected by dental caries (median 4 versus 1.5), and more dental plaques (median 70.5 versus 60.7) among asthmatic adolescents. They also had a significantly higher frequency of salivary leucocytes. The non-stimulated salivary flow was similar in both groups. CONCLUSIONS: The results suggest an association between the use of inhaled corticosteroids and an increased risk of dental caries and bacterial plaque, which calls for special attention of these patients by doctors and dental health professionals.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Ascaris lumbricoides infection in urban schoolchildren: Specific IgE and IL-10 production

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
BACKGROUND: 

Helminth infections and allergies are diseases with intense Th2 lymphocytes participation and characterised by a high IgE and Interleukin-(IL) IL-4, IL-5 production and eosinophilia. However, helminths also induce IL-10 production, which may alter the outcome of allergic diseases in infected patients.

OBJECTIVE: 

This experimental study analyses the relationship between IL-10 production by cell culture from geohelminth infected and non-infected children and specific IgE to Ascaris lumbricoides (Asc) or Blomia tropicalis (BT).

METHODS: 

IL-10 content in supernatant from peripheral blood mononuclear cell culture from nine helminth infected and eleven non-infected patients was determined by ELISA after in vitro stimulation with Asc or BT extracts.

RESULTS: 

A positive association was observed between total IgE levels and anti-Ascaris and anti-Blomia tropicalis specific IgE, independent of infection status. For both helminth-infected and non-infected groups, there was no difference in IL-10 production in response to Asc extract, even though anti-Ascaris IgE levels were higher in the latter group. In response to BT stimulus, a lower production of IL-10 by the geohelminth-infected group was observed, but with no relationship between IL-10 production and specific IgE to BT.

CONCLUSION: 

The results suggest that anti-Ascaris IgE in non-infected patients may be associated to a resistance to parasites. Levels of specific IgE to parasite antigens or B. tropicalis allergen were not impaired by IL-10 production in children from an urban area in which geohelminthiasis is endemic.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A presente inveno descreve um aparato para confeco de cavidade em recipiente e um mtodo para modificao de recipiente para concepo de espaador. Especificamente, a presente inveno compreende um perfurador (10), uma haste (20) e um isolador trmico (30), em que, os ditos elementos compreendidos so associados e formam a principal ferramenta a ser utilizada pelo mtodo da presente inveno. A presente inveno capaz de ser utilizada para a criao de espaadores de forma prtica, e acessvel a vrias pessoas. A presente inveno se situa nos campos da sade e doenas respiratrias.
